mapper.select: SELECT c.company_name, c.company_address, j.title, j.start_date, c.company_image, IFNULL(SUM(s.score)/COUNT(s.user_id), 0) AS rating, j.job_history, IFNULL(j.end_date, '상시') AS end_date FROM tbl_job_post j LEFT JOIN tbl_company c ON j.company_id = c.company_id LEFT JOIN tbl_company_score s ON j.company_id = s.company_id WHERE j.start_date <= NOW() AND (j.end_Date IS NULL OR j.end_date >= NOW()) GROUP BY j.job_post_no, j.company_id, c.company_name, c.company_address, j.title, j.start_date, j.end_date, c.company_image ORDER BY rating DESC LIMIT 6
